en_title: Secretary for Justice attended Chatham House seminar in London (with photo)
zh_title: 律政司司長在倫敦出席查塔姆研究所研討會（附圖）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, today (October 15, London time) attended a seminar organised by the Chatham House in London and delivered a speech on Hong Kong's rule of law and constitutional reforms.

He also met with the Attorney General, the Rt Hon Jeremy Wright, QC, MP to exchange view on some legal matters of mutual concern. He also made a courtesy call on the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the United Kingdom, Mr Liu Xiaoming.
Mr Yuen will return to and arrive in Hong Kong on the afternoon of October 16.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（倫敦時間十月十五日）在倫敦出席一個由查塔姆研究所舉辦的研討會，並發表關於香港法治和政制改革的演說。
他亦與檢察總長Jeremy Wright會面，就雙方關注的法律事宜交換意見。此外，他禮節性拜會了中華人民共和國駐英國大使劉曉明。
袁國強將於十月十六日下午返抵香港。

He also met with the Attorney General, the Rt Hon Jeremy Wright, QC, MP to exchange view on some legal matters of mutual concern
He also made a courtesy call on the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the United Kingdom, Mr Liu Xiaoming.
Mr Yuen will return to and arrive in Hong Kong on the afternoon of October 16.
